trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCollapse"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterExpand"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCollapse"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterExpand"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified tree node.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs"></xref>指定的树节点的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that the event is responding to.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified tree node and with the specified type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs"></xref>类指定的树节点，并使用引发事件的操作指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that the event is responding to.
The type of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction"></xref> that raised the event.
Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发事件的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction"></xref> that raised the event.
Gets the tree node that has been checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有已选中、 展开、 折叠或选择的树节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that has been checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> ，已选中、 展开、 折叠状态，或选择。
